name: bcbio-run-workflow
title: Create and run BCBIO Workflow
summary: Creates and runs a BCBIO Workflow on DNAnexus using a YAML template and a sample specification

inputSpec.name: sample_spec
inputSpec.label: CSV Sample Specification (description of input files and batch)

inputSpec.name: output_folder
inputSpec.label: Output folder for workflows and data

inputSpec.name: reuse_workflow
inputSpec.label: Workflow ID or path within project of existing DNAnexus workflow (as opposed to compiling a new one)

inputSpec.name: pull_from_docker_registry
inputSpec.label: Pull the bcbio image from the Docker registry as opposed to using a cached asset

outputSpec.name: generated_cwl
outputSpec.label: tar-gz of the generated CWL for this run
